page.title: 03OLD PEOPLE'S MEMORIES.
page.content: Two of us were trying to find out how far people could remember about their life.We are interviewing mostly old people with an exception of some younger adults as well. In our{D-block which is Easthorpe and a small part of Messing,there are not many old people but some people are very co-operative and we got quite a lot of information. Apparently Easthorpe hasn't changed much over the years,but a new estate has been built and more people have moved in.The traffic is gradually growing buisier because of this. The fields have got much bigger in size because the farmers have pulled down the hedges to get more produce in the way of crops.The food has changed somewhat because they didn't have things like sugarbeet and rape as we have nowadays.
